Naive Bayes Calibration Method¶

class clumpy.calibration.NaiveBayes¶

Bases: clumpy.calibration._calibration._Calibration

Naive Bayes calibration method.

fit(case: clumpy.definition._case.Case)¶

fit model with a discretized case

Parameters

case (Case) – The case which have to be discretized.

Notes

New attributes are availables :

self.P_zk__vi

self.P_zk__vi_vf

self.P_vf__vi

plot_P_zk__vi(vi, Zk_name, max_one=False, sum_one=False, color=None, linestyle='-', linewidth=1.5, label=None, alpha=None, step=True)¶

plots a given \(P_k(\hat{z}|v_i,v_f)\).

plots a given \(P_k(\hat{z}|v_i,v_f)\).

transition_probability_maps(case: clumpy.definition._case.Case, P_vf__vi=None)¶

Infer transition probability maps

Parameters

  • case (Case) – The case which have to be discretized..

  • P_vf__vi (Pandas DataFrame (default=None)) – The transition matrix. If None, the fitted self.P_vf__vi is used.

Returns

maps – The transition probability maps

Return type

TransitionProbabilityLayers
